entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Melville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
